Posts.Content: Hi sorry to hear its back, me too just started thinking things were getting back to normal and then it was back in my lungs :(( I am scared and havent shared the news with many people yet, when I do talk about it Ifind people are upset so I try not to. Idont know of any groups and so feel quite isolated and scared. so the answer is yes to is anyone else going through this, I find when i am positive Ifeel physically better, laughter is great for coping, just forgetting about it for a few mins helps too. Kas x
